dc_title_s: Height Modernization (ILHMP) LiDAR Data: Rock Island County, Illinois: 2009
dc_description_s: This LiDAR data is within Illinois Department of Transportation District 2 and includes Rock Island County, Illinois. The data is updated from its original format to LAS version 1.2. The LiDAR data was collected in May 2009 as 'Rock Island County, Illinois LiDAR Acquisition' - ILDOT Project No. AM151-059-06, PTB 151 Item #59. Data was acquired by Quantum Spatial as project 1090718 with an Optech ALTM Gemini sensor equipped with an inertial measuring unit (IMU) and GPS receiver. The acquisition was to produce first return ASCII, bare earth ASCII, DAT and TIN files.
dct_spatial_sm: Rock Island County, Illinois, United States
